kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

test.doc: This scenario to test user can get product catalog from coba sekarang on marketplace page

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
